name: part_001
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】Takanashi Kiara 4th Anniversary Live ~「MIRAGE」WITH A SURPRISE!？ #Kiara4years [0LoG81pLS8c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_001.mov

scenes.description: Roboco-san provides a quick greeting on the virtual red carpet.
Pavolia Reine is interviewed about her feelings for the upcoming performance and gives a message to viewers.
Kazama Iroha introduces herself and talks about her preparations for the live show in a mix of English and Japanese.
IRyS expresses her excitement for the performance with Kiara and thanks the viewers.
Takanashi Kiara talks about her hard work for the live show and encourages viewers to engage with the channel.
The live performance begins with Takanashi Kiara singing 'HINOTORI [REDSHIFT Remix]' on stage.

subtitles.original: 瞬く 星の揺りかご
